title: Woodoo8
author: Woodoo8
content: Hello guys, I have a rig with 5 580 and a 3080lhr, I use hiveos on nbminer 42.2. to increase the hash of the 3080 which is now 82.5 with -100 1100 and 100% fun I should insert in extra config argouments "platform": 1? only that having also the amd under the same rig they work? what do you recommend to push hard, thanks

comments.author: Ketesnuko
comments.body: 82MH from a 3080 RTX is wrong, I get 81MH on my RTX 3070 Ti without overclocking it so I believe you should be getting more with RTX 3080 graphic card, something over 90MH or very close to 100MH is realistic..As for your problem you don't need that argument, you need to add extra miner, use Nbminer for the Nvidia and Teamredminer for the AMDs, just add both miners

comments.author: Coinfarm ventures
comments.body: I think 100 Mh is the expected hashrate for the RTX 3080 with the LHR unlock. You might be getting less because of VRAM throttling. Can you monitor memory temperatures?
